bibl.title: The World of Ancient Egypt. Essays in Honor of Ahmed Abd el-Qader el-Sawi
bibl.note: The Greek, Jewish and Phoenician mercenaries in the Egyptian army since the beginning of the reign of Psammetichus I.
SMOLÁRIKOVÁ Kveta, The Mercenary Troops - An Essential Element of the Late Period's Military Power.

Khaled DAOUD and Sawsan ABD EL-FATAH (Edd.), The World of Ancient Egypt. Essays in Honor of Ahmed Abd el-Qader el-Sawi = Supplément aux Annales du Service des Antiquités de l'Égypte. Cahier 35 (Le Caire, 2006) pp. 245-248.
